Migrate to React 19 + Tailwind CSS v4 and add application tracking display

- Integrates Tailwind CSS v4 for modern styling with utility classes

- Automatically resets the applications list when listing ID changes
- Links each application to its Salesforce record for easy access
- Updates CLAUDE.md to reflect new React/Tailwind architecture
